For the balsamic and thyme dressing: small handful fresh chopped parsley leaves
salt and freshly ground black pepper
For the chargrilled baby corn: salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: For the balsamic and thyme dressing, whisk together the olive oil, balsamic vinegar and chopped parsley in a small bowl. Season to taste with salt and freshly ground black pepper.
For the salad, place all of the salad ingredients into a large bowl, drizzle over the dressing and toss well to coat.

For the chargrilled baby corn, heat a griddle until hot. Toss the baby corn in a bowl with the olive oil, season with salt and freshly ground black pepper and then cook on the griddle for 2-3 minutes on both sides, until tender.
To serve, place the chargrilled baby corn onto a serving plate and top with the salad.
title: Spring greens salad with chargrilled baby corn, cherry tomatoes and balsamic and thyme dressing
